name: Shoot Your Shots
description:
It's friday night!

You're chilling with your friends at that one bar you always end up going to, when suddenly, upon seeing the dart board (that someone thought is a good idea to put in a bar for some reason), someone suggests playing darts.

You're not in your best of shapes, so you play the most minimal version version of darts which basically boils down to 2 rules:

1. Hit the board.

2. Don't hit anything else.

Anyway, that's what the game was supposed to be about, but as I'm still studying game dev, the game's as minimal as the version of darts it depicts.

I hope to finish it as I imagined it when I have more experience, but in the meantime I hope you can somehow enoy this =]
